name: UITextDocumentProxy
desc: An object that provides textual context to a custom keyboard.

items.name: var documentInputMode: UITextInputMode?
items.desc: The text-input mode for the keyboard.

items.name: var documentContextAfterInput: String?
items.desc: Textual context after the insertion point in the current text input object.

items.name: var documentContextBeforeInput: String?
items.desc: Textual context before the insertion point in the current text input object.

items.name: func adjustTextPosition(byCharacterOffset: Int)
items.desc: Moves the insertion point forward or backward in the current text input object.

items.name: var selectedText: String?
items.desc: The currently selected text in the document.

items.name: func setMarkedText(String, selectedRange: NSRange)
items.desc: Inserts the provided text and marks it to indicate that it is part of an active input session.

items.name: var documentIdentifier: UUID
items.desc: The unique identifier for the document.
